First Mate0244972685xo9hmy3teon7d50f32njvwntfxa1769362015-03-14T20:55:59ZSharp Blades26158496{{Character
|Title = First Mate
|Image = First_mate.png
|Season = [[Season 4|4]]
|First = "[[The Laws of Gods and Men]]"
|Status = [[:Category:Status: Alive|Alive]]
|Allegiance = [[House Greyjoy]]
|Culture = [[Ironborn]]
|Religion = [[Drowned God]]
|Actor = [[Rhodri Miles]]|Appearances = 1 episode <small>[[#Appearances|(see below)]]</small>}}The '''first mate''' is an unnamed minor character in the [[Season 4|fourth season]]. He is played by guest star [[Rhodri Miles]] and debuts in "[[The Laws of Gods and Men]]".
sections.In the books: In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, Asha Greyjoy's crew adore her devotedly. Half of them love her as their daughter, the other half want to have sex with her, and all of them would die for her.
sections.Biography:
===Background===

He is one of the fifty best [[ironborn]] fighters and follows [[Yara Greyjoy]] after she chooses him to go with her to [[the Dreadfort]] to rescue [[Theon Greyjoy]].

===[[Season 4]]===
He enters the Dreadfort under the command of Yara Greyjoy as they try to take [[Theon Greyjoy]] back to the [[Iron Islands]]. They fight fiercely and kill many [[House Bolton|Bolton]] men, but when [[Ramsay Bolton|Ramsay Snow]] sets his [[Bastard's girls|hunting dogs]] free, they are forced to retreat to their boat.<ref>[[The Laws of Gods and Men]]</ref>
